snippet.title: 【Taiko no Tatsujin RHYTHM CONNECT】Official PV
snippet.description:
The latest installment of the "Taiko no Tatsujin" smartphone game, "Taiko no Tatsujin RHYTHM CONNECT," officially launched on November 1, 2023 (Wednesday)! Starting with Japan, it is currently being released in Indonesia, Thailand, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau (※In Japanese alphabetical order).   

In the PV, the protagonist alone in their room. They receive a game invitation for "Taiko no Tatsujin RHYTHM CONNECT" from a friend, and then proceed to start playing. 

This scene highlights the invitation sent via LINE by a friend as the opportunity. It showcases how the fans of "Taiko no Tatsujin" connect through such invitations, spreading joy and creating a sense of relationship, represented by the term "CONNECT."PV  
＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ 
【《Taiko no Tatsujin RHYTHM CONNECT》Download Link】 
https://bnent.jp/taikopv01/ 

【Official Website】 
https://app-ttrc.taiko-ch.net/en/ 

【Official Facebook Fan Page】 
https:/www.facebook.com/app.ttrc.taikoch.net.en 

【LINE OA】 
Indonesia: https://lin.ee/2M08DVQ 
Thailand: https://lin.ee/IVAHWZy  

【Game Features】 
1. Anytime, anywhere, Taiko no Tatsujin! Easy to play in your free time thanks to vertical gameplay!  
2. Discover your new favorite song! 800+ songs available to play for free! More songs to be added in the future! (*View ads to access the 800 songs for free.)  
3. Use the LINE Friend feature and play with your pals!  

【Taiko no Tatsujin】 Taiko no Tatsujin is easy to play. All you have to do is hit the Japanese taiko drum in time with the rhythm of the song. It's a rhythm game that kids and adults alike can enjoy together! 
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 
#TaikoNoTatsujin #TaikoNoTatsujinRHYTHMCONNECT #RhythmConnect #TTRC 

Taiko No Tatsujin RHYTHM CONNECT™ & ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. 
© LY Corporation
